entry.title: Javaè€ƒè¯•å¤ä¹ ç”¨
entry.content:
public static void main(String args[]) {
        System.out.println("è¾“å…¥å›æ–‡æ•°ï¼š");
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        String Read = sc.nextLine();
        char a[] = Read.toCharArray();
        boolean flag = false;
        for(int i = 0, j = a.length - 1; i != j && i <= j; i ++, j --){
            if(a[i] != a[j]) flag = true;
        }
        if(flag) System.out.println("ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•°");
        else System.out.println("æ˜¯å›æ–‡æ•°");
    }
